item.title: 投资者等待美联储决定，期货走高
item.description: 在人们广泛期待的美联储货币政策决定出台之前，美国股指期货周三有所上涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained some ground on Wednesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's widely anticipated monetary policy decision.】

item.title: 机构报告称富士康两年内服务器收入将超 iPhone
item.description: 据台湾 "中央社 "报道，全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司的主要 iPhone 制造商--台湾富士康公司预计，其服务器收入将在两年内超过 iPhone 收入。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's main iPhone maker, expects its server revenue to surpass its revenue from iPhones within two years, Taiwan’s Central News Agency reported.】

item.title: 投资者希望富国银行在 2025 年取消资产上限
item.description: 在富国银行成功结束 2025 年的五次监管行动后，投资者和分析师对今年取消富国银行的资产上限抱有更大的希望，这使其股票更具吸引力。【原文：Investors and analysts are more hopeful the asset cap on Wells Fargo will be lifted this year after the bank managed to close five regulatory actions in 2025, making its shares more attractive.】

item.title: 利率按兵不动，美联储的经济预测占据中心位置
item.description: 预计美联储将在周三维持利率稳定，政策制定者将发布新的经济预测，显示他们是否仍认为利率将在年底前走低，因为他们正在梳理特朗普政府头两个月的影响。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday, with new economic projections out from policymakers that will show if they still see rates moving lower by the end of the year as they sort through the implications of the first two months of the Trump administration.】

item.title: 大科技公司数据中心的蓬勃发展给美国电网运营商带来新风险
item.description: 数据中心小巷位于华盛顿特区外 30 平方英里处，是 200 多个数据中心的所在地，其耗电量与波士顿差不多。因此，去年夏天的一天，这些数据中心中的很大一部分（60 个）突然断电，转而使用现场发电机，这让电力公司的官员们大为震惊。【原文：Data Center Alley, a 30-square-mile stretch outside Washington D.C. and home to more than 200 data centers, consumes roughly the same electricity as Boston. So power company officials were alarmed when a big chunk of those centers - 60 of them - suddenly dropped off the grid one day last summer and switched to on-site generators.】

item.title: 美国政治边缘政策削弱了国债的避险地位
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策引发了市场动荡，投资者纷纷将美国国债作为避风港，但迫在眉睫的债务上限辩论和持续的政治边缘政策都严酷地提醒人们，即使是世界上最终的无风险资产也难免出现裂痕。【原文：Investors have been flocking to U.S. Treasuries as a safe haven due to market turmoil fueled by President Donald Trump’s trade policies, but a looming debt ceiling debate and ongoing political brinkmanship are stark reminders that even the world's ultimate risk-free asset is not immune to cracks.】

item.title: 贸易战迫在眉睫，特朗普将宴请美国顶级石油公司总裁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周三在白宫接待石油行业的高层管理人员，他将阐述在原油价格下跌和贸易战迫在眉睫的情况下促进国内能源生产的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will host top oil executives at the White House on Wednesday as he charts plans to boost domestic energy production in the midst of falling crude prices and looming trade wars.】

item.title: 贸易战迫在眉睫，特朗普将宴请美国顶级石油公司总裁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周三在白宫接待石油行业的高层管理人员，他将阐述在原油价格下跌和贸易战迫在眉睫的情况下促进国内能源生产的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will host top oil executives at the White House on Wednesday as he charts plans to boost domestic energy production in the midst of falling crude prices and looming trade wars.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官：仿人机器人革命比你想象的更近了
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）认为，仿人机器人距离在制造设施中广泛使用还有不到五年的时间。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang believes humanoid robots are less than five years away from seeing wide use in manufacturing facilities.】

item.title: 日本称经济正在复苏，但提示特朗普贸易政策带来的风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策可能会抑制全球经济增长，通胀率上升可能会损害消费者支出。【原文：Japan's government stuck with its cautiously optimistic outlook for the economy U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policies could dampen global growth and higher inflation could hurt consumer spending.】

item.title: 印度沃达丰 Idea 探索与马斯克的 Starlink 合作
item.description: 印度电信公司沃达丰Idea周三表示，该公司正在与包括埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的Starlink公司在内的多家卫星通信提供商进行探索性谈判，以扩展其互联网服务。【原文：Indian teleco firm Vodafone Idea is in exploratory talks with various satellite communication providers, including Elon Musk's Starlink, to expand its internet services, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 外商直接投资下滑，贸易紧张局势加剧，北京向全球高管示好
item.description: 本周初，中国贸易官员会见了多达三位外国企业高管，在消费低迷和贸易紧张局势重现的情况下，中国政府仍在加强魅力攻势，试图向全球商界领袖保证中国经济的长期前景。【原文：Chinese trade officials are stepping up a charm offensive as Beijing seeks to assure global business leaders of the economy's long-term prospects despite a consumer slump and renewed trade tensions, meeting as many as three foreign executives early this week.】

item.title: 解说：中国和香港对长江和记的港口交易有何影响力？
item.description: 总部位于香港的企业集团长江和记正面临中国政府对其向贝莱德领导的财团出售港口的强烈批评，这加剧了人们对中国是否可能采取措施破坏该交易的猜测。【原文：Hong Kong-based conglomerate CK Hutchison is facing intense criticism from Beijing over its ports sale to a BlackRock-led consortium, fuelling speculation as to whether China could take steps to scupper the deal.】

item.title: Seven & i、Couche-Tard 就可能的店铺剥离签署 NDA
item.description: 日本的 Seven & i 公司和 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司签署了一份保密协议，一旦加拿大零售商收购了这家日本公司，他们可能需要出售哪些门店以满足美国的反垄断条件。【原文：Japan's Seven & i and Alimentation Couche-Tard have signed a non-disclosure agreement over the stores they may need to offload to meet U.S. antitrust conditions in the event the Canadian retailer buys the Japanese company, a Seven & i spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会文件显示，Exor 持有飞利浦的股份增至 18.7
item.description: 向美国证券交易委员会提交的一份文件显示，意大利阿涅利家族的投资机构 Exor NV 已将其在荷兰医疗技术公司飞利浦公司的股份增至 18.7%。【原文：Exor NV , the investment arm of Italy's Agnelli family, has increased its stake in Dutch medical technology company Philips to 18.7%, a filing at the U.S. Security and Exchange Commission showed.】

item.title: 游戏业务回暖，腾讯第四季度业绩强劲
item.description: 受游戏业务增长的推动，中国科技巨头腾讯控股周三公布第四季度收入增长 11%。【原文：Chinese technology giant Tencent Holdings posted an 11% rise in fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, driven by growth in its gaming business.】

item.title: 印度经济增长乏力，中国正向印度招手，外国投资者纷纷向印度倾斜
item.description: 全球投资者正在抛弃印度股市，以创纪录的速度抛售股票，转而购买中国股票，这是亚洲巨头在过去六个月中命运的戏剧性逆转。【原文：Global investors are deserting India's stock market, selling shares at a record pace to buy Chinese stocks instead, in a dramatic reversal of fortunes for the Asian giants over the last six months.】

item.title: 中国人工智能公司智璞在国家支持下融资 2.57 亿美元
item.description: 据中国国家媒体《新京报》周三报道，中国人工智能初创公司智璞人工智能（Zhipu AI）已从成都政府支持的基金获得了3亿元人民币（合4150万美元）的投资，这是中国城市支持国内人工智能发展的最新举措。【原文：Chinese AI startup Zhipu AI has secured 300 million yuan ($41.5 million) in investment from a Chengdu government-backed fund, state media, the Beijing News reported on Wednesday, in the latest move by Chinese cities to support domestic AI development.】

item.title: 韩国 SK On 赢得日产电动汽车电池业务
item.description: 韩国电池制造商 SK On 周三表示，该公司已赢得为美国日产汽车公司供应电动汽车电池的协议。【原文：South Korean battery maker SK On said on Wednesday that it had won a deal to supply batteries for electric vehicles for Nissan Motor in the United States.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国朗思科技的目标是 7 月在香港上市
item.description: 两位知情人士称，在深圳上市的中国移动屏幕制造商Lens Technology正计划在本月底前提交香港上市申请，争取在7月份完成上市。【原文：Shenzhen-listed Chinese mobile screen maker Lens Technology is planning to file an application for a Hong Kong listing by the end of this month, aiming to get the offering done in July, said two people with knowledge of the deal.】

item.title: 辉瑞以 32.4 亿美元的价格出售 Haleon 全部股权
item.description: 辉瑞制药公司周三表示，已将其在 Haleon 的全部股份以约 25 亿英镑（32.4 亿美元）的价格出售给机构投资者和消费者保健公司，每股价格为 385 便士。【原文：Drugmaker Pfizer has sold its entire stake in Haleon for about 2.5 billion pounds ($3.24 billion) to institutional investors and the consumer healthcare firm at 385 pence per share, a bookrunner for the deal said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国软猫公司因人工智能需求增长而上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: IT服务提供商软猫公司（Softcat）周三表示，受人工智能和自动化需求增长的支撑，该公司预计2025年的营业利润增长率将达到较低的两位数，高于此前的高一位数增长预期。【原文：IT services provider Softcat said on Wednesday it expects operating profit growth for 2025 to be in the low double-digit percentage range, up from its prior high single-digit growth expectation, supported by growing demand for AI and automation.】

item.title: 大众以每股 32.75 欧元的价格出售价值 3.6 亿欧元的特拉通股份
item.description: 大众汽车公司周三表示，它以 3.6 亿欧元（3.93 亿美元）或每股 32.75 欧元的价格出售了特拉通公司 2.2% 的股份，以改善这家商用车子公司的股票交易。【原文：Volkswagen said on Wednesday it sold a 2.2% stake in Traton for 360 million euros ($393 million) or 32.75 euros per share for better trading in shares of the commercial-vehicles subsidiary.】

item.title: 日本航空公司将购买 17 架波音 737-8 飞机和 11 架空客 A321neo 飞机
item.description: 日本航空公司周三表示，计划为其机队增购 17 架波音 737-8 飞机。【原文：Japan Airlines said on Wednesday it plans to buy 17 additional Boeing 737-8 aircraft for its fleet.】

item.title: 新加坡竞争监管局称尚未就 Grab 和 GoTo 合并计划发布指导意见
item.description: 新加坡竞争与消费者委员会（Competition and Consumer Commission of Singapore）周三表示，尚未收到乘车和送货公司 Grab 或 GoTo 关于拟议合并的通知。【原文：The Competition and Consumer Commission of Singapore has not received notification from ride and delivery companies Grab or GoTo on a proposed merger, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：各国央行昙花一现
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 普渡制药公司为 74 亿美元阿片类药物和解申请新的破产计划
item.description: 破产制药商普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）周二提交了一份新的破产计划，这是去年在美国最高法院受挫后，该公司朝着最终达成至少 74 亿美元的阿片类药物和解协议迈出的重要一步。【原文：Bankrupt drugmaker Purdue Pharma filed a new bankruptcy plan on Tuesday, a major step towards finalizing a proposed opioid settlement of at least $7.4 billion after a setback in the U.S. Supreme Court last year.】

item.title: 育碧《刺客信条：阴影》面临生死存亡的时刻
item.description: 育碧正依靠《刺客信条：阴影》的成功来摆脱财务困境，这家法国电子游戏出版商正努力应对收入下降、股价下挫和收购猜测等问题。【原文：Ubisoft is banking on the success of "Assassin's Creed Shadows" to fight its way out of financial troubles as the French videogame publisher grapples with falling revenue, a sinking stock price and takeover speculation.】

item.title: 英伟达公司首席执行官称节电光学芯片技术的广泛应用尚需时日
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周二表示，一项旨在降低能耗、前景广阔的新芯片技术还不够可靠，无法用于英伟达的旗舰图形处理器（GPU）。【原文：A promising new chip technology that aims to cut energy usage is not yet reliable enough for use in Nvidia's flagship graphics processing units (GPUs), Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang said Tuesday.】

item.title: 黄金因避险需求徘徊在纪录高位附近；美联储决议成为焦点
item.description: 周三，由于中东紧张局势和贸易不确定性提升了金银的吸引力，同时交易商在等待美联储当天晚些时候的决定，黄金维持在3000美元/盎司的关键水平上方，在上一交易日创下的纪录高位附近交投。【原文：Gold held above the key $3,000/oz level on Wednesday, trading near a record high hit in the previous session, as Middle East tensions and trade uncertainties lifted bullion's appeal, while traders awaited the Federal Reserve's decision later in the day.】
